name: Stryx
tagline:
I'm a coffee drinker studying at
the University of Cats and Stuff
about: Tor is like an ogre, it has layers.
aboutsectiontext:
Now this is the story all about how,
My life got flipped-turned upside down,
And I'd like to take a minute, just sit right there,
I'll tell you how I became the princess of a town called Sacremento.
